body_html: TensorArray carries a list of Tensors inside it, so it may be considered a view... But any attempt to read out multiple Tensors, i.e. via the gather method, necessarily performs a copy for the reasons I gave above.

body: TensorArray carries a list of Tensors inside it, so it may be considered a view... But any attempt to read out multiple Tensors, i.e. via the gather method, necessarily performs a copy for the reasons I gave above.
